description: Grimsby make it back-to-back home wins to keep their grip on the final play-off spot with a 3-1 triumph over Morecambe.
title: Grimsby Town 3-1 Morecambe
maintext:
Grimsby Town are unbeaten across their last three Football League games against Morecambe (W2 D1), and will be looking to go four unbeaten against them for the first time.
Morecambe have won three of their last five away Football League games against Grimsby Town (L2), with those victories all coming via different scorelines (2-1, 2-0 & 3-0).
Grimsby have lost three of their last five league games (W2), as many as their previous 14 beforehand (W7 D4 L3).
Morecambe have lost each of their last eight away league games in succession, scoring just two goals in that time – it’s their longest ever losing run on their travels in the top four tiers.
